FuncDef: The display ip as-path-filter command displays the detailed configurations of the AS_Path filter.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the number of an AS_Path filter.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 256.

Specifies the name of an AS_Path filter.
The value is a string ranging from 1 to 51.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check detailed configurations of an AS_Path filter, run the display ip as-path-filter command.
